--- layout: datasheet title: Capture Engine Instrument description: Capture Engine redistributes packets from physical interface to mirror-bridge interface(s). Instrument ---

Capture Engine is used to mirror traffic from one physical interface to one or more mirror-bridge interfaces. Using Capture Engine allows multiple Instruments to have access to same traffic flow without the need for accessing the physical interface at all.

Using Capture Engine separates the physical interface from any Instrument actually parsing the traffic, thus reducing possibility that Instrument could access the network.

Properties

Developer SensorFleet Oy
Categories Internal
Network access type Passive
Required interfaces
  • Physical interface which is mirrored.
  • Mirror Interface(s) where physical interface data is mirrored.
Dependencies None
Data retention Capture Engine does not store information.
Management UI No
